1.verse: Nze Pawulo ne Sirwano ne Timoseewo tuwandiikira Ekkanisa ey’Abasessaloniika, abantu ba Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo,

2.verse: ekisa n’emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, bibeerenga nammwe.

3.verse: Okwebaza n’Okusaba - Kitugwanidde okwebazanga Katonda bulijjo ku lwammwe abooluganda, nga bwe kisaana, kubanga okukkiriza kwammwe kweyongedde nnyo okukula, awamu n’okwagalana kwammwe mwekka na mwekka,

4.verse: ekyo ne kituleetera ffe ffennyini okubeenyumiririzaamu mu kkanisa za Katonda olw’okugumiikiriza kwammwe n’okukkiriza kwammwe wakati mu kuyigganyizibwa kwammwe kwonna awamu n’okubonaabona bye mugumiikiriza.

5.verse: Ako kabonero akalaga nti Katonda mutuukirivu mu kulamula kwe, mmwe mulyoke musaanire obwakabaka bwa Katonda, bwe mubonaabonera,

6.verse: ate ng’abo ababanyigiriza alibabonereza nga bwe kibagwanidde.

7.verse: Era nammwe abanyigirizibwa muliweerwa wamu naffe ekiwummulo, mu kubikkulirwa kwa Mukama waffe Yesu bw’aliva mu ggulu, ne bamalayika be ab’amaanyi,

8.verse: mu muliro ogwaka, n’abonereza abo abatamanyi Katonda era abajeemera Enjiri ya Mukama waffe Yesu.

9.verse: Abo baliweebwa ekibonerezo kya kuzikirira emirembe n’emirembe, nga baawukanyiziddwa ne Mukama waffe, n’ekitiibwa ky’amaanyi ge.

10.verse: Bw’alijja okugulumizibwa mu batukuvu be ku lunaku luli abo bonna abamukkiriza balyewuunya kubanga mwakkiriza bye twabategeeza ku ye.

11.verse: Kyetuva tubasabira bulijjo, Katonda waffe abasaanyize okuyitibwa kwammwe. Abawe amaanyi mutuukirize ebirungi byonna bye mukola, na buli mulimu ogw’okukkiriza mu maanyi,

12.verse: erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu liryoke ligulumizibwe mu mmwe, nammwe muweebwe ekitiibwa mu ye, ng’ekisa kya Katonda waffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo bwe kiri.

1.verse: Ebikolwa by’omulabe wa Kristo - Kaakano abooluganda, ku by’okukomawo kwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, era n’okukuŋŋaanyizibwa okumusisinkana, tubasaba

2.verse: muleme okweraliikirira wadde emitima okubeewanika newaakubadde olw’omwoyo, newaakubadde olw’ekigambo wadde olw’ebbaluwa, ebirabika ng’ebivudde gye tuli, nga biranga nti olunaku lwa Mukama lutuuse.

3.verse: Omuntu yenna tabalimbalimbanga mu ngeri yonna; kubanga okuggyako ng’obujeemu busoose okujja, n’omuntu oli ow’obujeemu, omwana w’okuzikirira ng’amaze okulabisibwa,

4.verse: oyo alivvoola Katonda ne yeegulumiza okusinga ebintu byonna nga yeeyita katonda oba ekissibwamu ekitiibwa atuule mu yeekaalu ya Katonda omwo nga yeefuula okuba Katonda.

5.verse: Temujjukira ng’ebyo nabibategeeza bwe nnali nammwe?

6.verse: Era ekikyamuziyizza mukimanyi kubanga tagenda kujja okutuusa ng’ekiseera kye kituuse.

7.verse: Kubanga ekyama ky’obujeemu kyatandika dda okukola, naye ye yennyini tagenda kujja okutuusa oyo amuziyiza lw’aliva mu kkubo.

8.verse: Olwo omuntu ow’obujeemu alyoke alabisibwe, Mukama waffe Yesu gw’alimalawo n’omukka ogw’omu kamwa ke n’amuzikiriza n’okulabisibwa kw’okujja kwe.

9.verse: Omuntu oyo alijjira mu maanyi ga Setaani gonna n’akola obubonero n’eby’amagero, eby’obulimba,

10.verse: era n’obulimba obwa buli ngeri obw’obutali butuukirivu eri abo abazikirizibwa, kubanga bagaana okukkiriza amazima okulokolebwa.

11.verse: Katonda kyava abawaayo eri okubuzibwabuzibwa okw’amaanyi bakkirize eby’obulimba.

12.verse: Era bonna balyoke basalirwe omusango olw’okukkiriza obulimba, ne bagaana amazima ne basanyukira okukola ebitali bya butuukirivu.

13.verse: Naye kitugwanidde okwebazanga Katonda ennaku zonna ku lwammwe, abooluganda abaagalwa mu Mukama waffe, kubanga Katonda yabalondera obulokozi okuva ku lubereberye, ng’abatukuza olw’okukola kw’Omwoyo n’okukkiriza amazima,

14.verse: ge yabayitira ng’ayita mu Njiri yaffe mulyoke mufune ekitiibwa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo.

15.verse: Noolwekyo abooluganda, munywererenga ku ebyo bye twabayigiriza mu bbaluwa zaffe oba mu bigambo byaffe.

16.verse: Kale Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo yennyini, ne Katonda Kitaffe eyatwagala n’atuwa essanyu n’essuubi eddungi olw’ekisa kye,

17.verse: abazzeemu amaanyi, era abanywezenga mu buli kye mukola ne mu buli kigambo ekirungi.

1.verse: Okusabirwanga - Abooluganda, eky’enkomerero, mutusabirenga, ekigambo kya Mukama kibune mangu era Mukama agulumizibwenga, nga bw’agulumizibwa mu mmwe,

2.verse: tulyoke tununulibwe okuva mu bakozi b’ebibi, kubanga si bonna abakkiriza.

3.verse: Naye Mukama waffe mwesigwa, alibanyweza mmwe era anaabawonyanga Setaani.

4.verse: Era twesiga nga Mukama waffe, abakozesa ebyo bye twabayigiriza era nga munaabikolanga bulijjo.

5.verse: Mukama waffe aluŋŋamyenga emitima gyammwe mu kutegeera okwagala kwa Katonda, n’obugumiikiriza obuva eri Kristo.

6.verse: Abalabula obutagayaalanga - Abooluganda abaagalwa, mbakuutira mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo ne mu buyinza bwe, mwewalenga abagayaavu abatayagala kukola mirimu ne balemwa okugoberera ekyokulabirako kye twabateerawo.

7.verse: Kubanga mmwe bennyini mumanyi bulungi bwe kibagwanira okutugobereranga ng’ekyokulabirako kyammwe, kubanga temwatulaba nga twegomba okulya ebyo bye tutakoleredde,

8.verse: tetwakkiriza kulya mmere ya muntu yenna awatali kumusasula. Twafubanga nnyo ne tukoowa nga tukola emirimu emisana n’ekiro tulyoke tufunemu bye twetaaga okukozesa, era tuleme kuzitoowerera muntu n’omu ku mmwe.

9.verse: Si kubanga tetwalina buyinza okubagamba mmwe okutuliisa, naye twayagala mutulabireko nga bwe kibagwanidde okukolanga.

10.verse: Era ne bwe twali gye muli eyo, twabakuutira nti omuntu yenna bw’agaananga okukola emirimu, n’okulya talyanga.

11.verse: Kyokka tuwulira nti mu mmwe mulimu abagayaavu abatayagala kukola, aboonoona ebiseera byabwe mu kusaasaanya eŋŋambo.

12.verse: Mu linnya lya Mukama waffe, tubeegayirira era tubakuutira abali bwe batyo, okukolanga emirimu n’obunyiikivu n’obuteefu balyoke balyenga ebyo bye bakoleredde.

13.verse: Naye mmwe temukoowanga kukola bulungi abooluganda abaagalwa.

14.verse: Era omuntu yenna bw’atagonderanga biragiro byaffe mu bbaluwa eno, oyo mumwetegereze, muleme kukolagananga naye, ensonyi ziryoke zimukwate.

15.verse: So temumuyisanga nga mulabe wammwe naye mumubuulirirenga ng’owooluganda eyetaaga okulabulwa.

16.verse: Eky’enkomerero - Kale Mukama nannyini mirembe abawenga emirembe mu byonna. Mukama abeerenga nammwe mwenna.

17.verse: Kuno kwe kulamusa kwange, nze Pawulo, mu mukono gwange, bwe ntyo bwe nkola ku nkomerero z’ebbaluwa zange zonna okulaga nti zivudde gye ndi. Bwe nti bwe mpandiika.

18.verse: Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga nammwe mwenna.
